com.joliciel.talismane.filters

Class RegexMarkerFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.filters.RegexMarkerFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextMarkerFilter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DuplicateWhiteSpaceFilter, NewlineEndOfSentenceMarker, NewlineSpaceMarker, OtherWhiteSpaceFilter

    public class RegexMarkerFilter
extends Object
implements TextMarkerFilter
    For a given regex, finds any matches within the text, and adds the appropriate marker to these matches. If not group is provided, will match the expression as a whole.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<TextMarker> apply(String prevText, String text, String nextText)
      Apply the filter to the text (not to prevText or nextText), and detect any text markers.
      String getAttribute()
      If the filter adds a tag, the attribute to add.
      int getBlockSize()
      The maximum size of text that this filter can match (without risking to add only the beginning and not the end, or vice versa).
      String getFind() 
      String getReplacement()
      If the filter includes text replacement, the replacement string.
      TokenAttribute<?> getValue()
      If the filter adds a tag, the value to add.

      • getBlockSize

        public int getBlockSize()
        Description copied from interface: TextMarkerFilter
        The maximum size of text that this filter can match (without risking to add only the beginning and not the end, or vice versa). Bigger matches will throw an error.
        Specified by:
        getBlockSize in interface TextMarkerFilter
